Posts.Content: Sarahmfallon wrote: Hi all!  I am new to this board and had a question - a little background info first.  I was dx Oct 2011 and did 4 rounds of Cysplatin/Gemcitabine (sp)? followed by a BMX/DIEP surgery on February 22nd.  I just got the results back from my MammaPrint and am considered high risk for a reoccurence so I will have to do chemo again.  This will lower my chance of reoccurence from 22% to 10%. I will be doing Cytoxan/Taxotere starting next Thursday and doing it weekly in smaller doses rather than every 3 weeks in larger doses for a total of 9 weeks.  I am doing this in hopes of keeping most of my hair (my doctor has studies that show weekly doses give me a 70-80% chance of keeping my hair while providing the same benefits), but it was mostly done in older ladies, I am 28. Has anyone received these 2 drugs in weekly doses?  How did you do? Did your hair fall out?  He said my side effects will be minimal as they were with the Cysplatin/Gemcitabine - I was a little tired and didnt have too much of an appetite but I didnt throw up once :) Thanks in advance for your help and comments! Sarah Diagnosis: 10/7/2011, IDC, 2.2cm, Stage II, Grade 3, 0/4 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2+ DIEP completed 2/22, stage II scheduled for 7/25. Chemo scheduled to be done 6/1 and herceptin scheduled to be done 9/21 Log in to post a reply
